alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Custer County through 600 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Miles City to 31 miles northeast of Volborg. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Locate, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area and Mizpah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
